modalContent: I enjoy using Mandarin to sing karaoke terribly, watch movies, videos and read the occassional book
I'm always at my local gym doing muscle building and strength based trainings
Lifetime Warriors Fan, occassionally tuning into the latest football, cricket and basketball games too
Currently playing Catan and Small World. Haven't gamed recently with my 10 year old Macbook
Extensively travelled all over Asia, including living in Taiwan and Japan.
